languages.text: "Скорее "бдительность". Сейчас странные ситуации могут казаться чем-то незначительным, но когда придет время, станет ясно — это были предупреждения, почти крик о нависшей угрозе. И поверьте моему опыту, доказательства не заставят себя ждать".

traits.locale_text: "Скорее "бдительность". Сейчас странные ситуации могут казаться чем-то незначительным, но когда придет время, станет ясно — это были предупреждения, почти крик о нависшей угрозе. И поверьте моему опыту, доказательства не заставят себя ждать".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."
languages.original_text: "Скорее "бдительность". Сейчас странные ситуации могут казаться чем-то незначительным, но когда придет время, станет ясно — это были предупреждения, почти крик о нависшей угрозе. И поверьте моему опыту, доказательства не заставят себя ждать".

traits.locale_text: "I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or warning shouts, even. My experience says that we won't have to wait for proof for very long."

"I should rather call it vigilance. Odd situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — nay, warning shouts. If you need proof, see if your liaison is still in his place. I am sure he has already been taken care of."

"I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

"I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

"I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

"I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

"I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or warning shouts, even. My experience says that we won't have to wait for proof for very long."

languages.text: "Ich würde es eher als Wachsamkeit bezeichnen. Seltsame Situationen mögen jetzt belanglos erscheinen, aber wenn sich die drohende Gefahr schließlich offenbart, werden wir erkennen, dass es Warnzeichen gab ... oder vielmehr warnende Schreie. Meine Erfahrung sagt mir, dass wir nicht lange auf einen Beweis warten müssen."
languages.original_text: "I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde es eher als Wachsamkeit bezeichnen. Seltsame Situationen mögen jetzt belanglos erscheinen, aber wenn sich die drohende Gefahr schließlich offenbart, werden wir erkennen, dass es Warnzeichen gab ... oder vielmehr warnende Schreie. Meine Erfahrung sagt mir, dass wir nicht lange auf einen Beweis warten müssen."

languages.text: « Je préfère parler de vigilance. Ces situations étranges semblent anodines pour le moment, mais quand la menace qui plane sur nous se révélera enfin, nous réaliserons qu'il y avait des signes avant-coureurs flagrants. D'après mon expérience, nous devrions rapidement découvrir de premières preuves. »
languages.original_text: "I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère parler de vigilance. Ces situations étranges semblent anodines pour le moment, mais quand la menace qui plane sur nous se révélera enfin, nous réaliserons qu'il y avait des signes avant-coureurs flagrants. D'après mon expérience, nous devrions rapidement découvrir de premières preuves. »

languages.text: 「それはむしろ警戒心と呼ぶべきでしょう。今は取るに足らないように見える異常な状況も、差し迫った脅威が姿を現すときになって初めて、それが警告の兆し…いえ、実際に警告の叫びだったと気づくのです。私の経験から言えば、それを裏付ける証拠が現れるのは、そう長く待たずに済むはずです」
languages.original_text: "I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

traits.locale_text: 「それはむしろ警戒心と呼ぶべきでしょう。今は取るに足らないように見える異常な状況も、差し迫った脅威が姿を現すときになって初めて、それが警告の兆し…いえ、実際に警告の叫びだったと気づくのです。私の経験から言えば、それを裏付ける証拠が現れるのは、そう長く待たずに済むはずです」

languages.text: «Yo preferiría decir que estoy alerta. Estas situaciones extrañas pueden parecer irrelevantes, pero cuando la amenaza subyacente salga a la luz, veremos que eran advertencias encubiertas, o incluso gritos de advertencia. La experiencia dice que no tardaremos en ver pruebas».
languages.original_text: "I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

traits.locale_text: «Yo preferiría decir que estoy alerta. Estas situaciones extrañas pueden parecer irrelevantes, pero cuando la amenaza subyacente salga a la luz, veremos que eran advertencias encubiertas, o incluso gritos de advertencia. La experiencia dice que no tardaremos en ver pruebas».

languages.text: “我更愿意称之为‘警惕’。这些古怪的状况乍看之下或许不值一提，但当迫近的威胁出现时，我们才会意识到：之前的一切都是预兆，甚至可以称得上是明晃晃的警告。根据我的经验，恐怕我们不用等多久，证据就会自动送上门来。”
languages.original_text: "I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

traits.locale_text: “我更愿意称之为‘警惕’。这些古怪的状况乍看之下或许不值一提，但当迫近的威胁出现时，我们才会意识到：之前的一切都是预兆，甚至可以称得上是明晃晃的警告。根据我的经验，恐怕我们不用等多久，证据就会自动送上门来。”

languages.text: "Ben ihtiyat demeyi tercih ederim. Şu an için önemsiz görünen garip durumların, aramızda gezinen tehdit gün gelip de açığa çıktığında birer uyarı işareti, hatta ikaz çığlığı olduğunu göreceğiz. Geçmiş tecrübelerim, bu durumun kanıtının yakında kendini belli edeceğini söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "I should rather call it vigilance. Strange situations may seem inconsequential now, but when the time comes for the looming threat to reveal itself, we will realise they were warning signs — or, indeed, warning shouts. Experience tells me we won't have long to wait for proof to emerge."

traits.locale_text: "Ben ihtiyat demeyi tercih ederim. Şu an için önemsiz görünen garip durumların, aramızda gezinen tehdit gün gelip de açığa çıktığında birer uyarı işareti, hatta ikaz çığlığı olduğunu göreceğiz. Geçmiş tecrübelerim, bu durumun kanıtının yakında kendini belli edeceğini söylüyor."
